DOC.brief_summary: The objective research conduct focus group order adapt Diabetes Prevention Program ( DPP ) may successfully target woman diagnosed gestational diabetes ( GDM ) high risk develop Type 2 diabetes post-partum period . As research seek gather formative data future intervention , focus group : 1 ) provide information maximize participation future intervention 2 ) inform location , content format intervention . We conduct focus group informant interview determine DPP modification necessary adapt post-partum lifestyle woman recent history GDM . Subjects attend 1 hour focus group phone interview encourage respond facilitator ' question 's comment topic : gestational diabetes , healthy eating , exercise , type 2 diabetes prevention relate activity . Working variety health care provider , include endocrinologist , obstetricians nurse-practitioners , identify enroll 60 woman total either current GDM patient BWH recent history GDM deliver Brigham Women 's Hospital last 5 year .
DOC.brief_title: Diabetes Prevention Women With Recent History Gestational Diabetes ( Focus Groups )
DOC.criteria: Healthy woman age 1845 Diagnosis gestational diabetes within past 5 year ( CarpenterCoustan criterion ) Englishspeaking Currently diagnose type 2 diabetes Diagnosis type 2 diabetes NonEnglishspeaking
